title: Top Boy
name: Carly Reddin
notes: As a big fan of the original two Top Boy series, this was a dream project to work on. I was art director in charge of the Jamaican shoot, which required me to be based over there for 7 weeks. It was a very exciting and enjoyable project that involved being in charge of a team of Jamaican construction, painters, and dressers.

title: Hanna - season 2
name: Carly Reddin
notes: An intenational project that required working across the UK, Paris and Barcelona

title: Argos - Autumn 2021
name: Agnieszka Debska
notes: A great fun job that involved building an enormous lock and key for the first shot

title: Everyday Performance Artists
name: Polly Stenham
notes: For Channel 4's "Random Acts" short series. Starring Gemma Chan and narrated by Shia LaBeouf. The story of an uncomfortably timed confession interrupted by a talkative narrator.

title: Interlude
name: Savvas Stavrou
company: Winner BFI SciFi London 48 hour film competition 2015
notes: Filmed in my flat for the BFI/SciFi London's 48hr film competition. Our winning short was conceived, written, shot, edited and completed in 2 days! For the competition, myself and the team were given the film's title, a line of dialogue, a prop and a science theme. Using these, we had to do all the creative work in the two days - and I'm proud to say that we won first place!

title: Kasabian - Ill Ray
name: Dan Cadan
notes: Filmed on Location in Leicester, starring Lena Headey (Game of Thrones) and Michael Socha (This is England). This was a fun video about a woman obsessed with Richard the III, who resurrects him using Alistair Crowley style Magick. I enjoyed making custom book covers and adding small details into the background. This shoot also required me to bring a prop skeleton from London to Leicester in the passenger seat of my car.

title: Snakehips - Either Way
name: Hector Dockrill
notes: A music video for a song by Snakehips & Anne-Marie featuring Joey Bada$$. We filmed this video in various parts of London over two days, I had to transform various plain rooms into bold and unique environments with set dressing. I'm particularly pleased with the "drag queen" set and the Jamaican set.

title: The Irrepressibles - Submission
name: Savvas Stavrou
notes: Another collaboration with the Director Savvas Stavrou - Two wrestlers struggle with their desires and fears as they fall in love with each other.

title: Metaxas - Selene
name: Savvas Stavrou
notes: Shot in one take, this music video required a lot of very precise mirror placement to not show our camera. It was a real collaboration between myself, the DOP and the performer to make sure it all worked.

title: Daytimer
name: Riz Ahmed
notes: Directed by Riz Ahmed and selected for the Sundance film festival, Daytimer was Riz's personal story about growing up as a British-Pakistani kid in the 90s. As well as Art Directing, I created all the graphics, inspired by colourful 90s UK garage and rave posters.
